problem.markdown:
>> A group of organisms that is distinct from other organisms and can interbreed to produce viable offspring is referred to as a:<< () family (x) species () niche () pod () genus
[explanation] A species is defined as a group of biologically similar organisms that can produce viable offspring. [explanation]
problem.p: A group of organisms that is distinct from other organisms and can interbreed to produce viable offspring is referred to as a:

choicegroup.label: A group of organisms that is distinct from other organisms and can interbreed to produce viable offspring is referred to as a:

div.p: A species is defined as a group of biologically similar organisms that can produce viable offspring.
